CustomField.description: to be decommissioned - User Support Query RT cleanup
CustomField.formula:
IF ( IsClosed = false, "NA",
IF((text(Work_Type__c)= "" ) || (text(Work_Type__c)= "Development" ) || (text(Work_Type__c)= "Project Related") || (text(Work_Type__c)= "Upgrade/Release"), "NA",
IF(ISPICKVAL(Work_Type__c, "System Maintenance") && Case_Age_In_Business_Hours__c <40 , "Stretch", IF(ISPICKVAL(Work_Type__c, "System Maintenance") && Case_Age_In_Business_Hours__c <80, "Target",
IF(ISPICKVAL(Work_Type__c, "Data Maintenance") && Case_Age_In_Business_Hours__c <30 , "Stretch", IF(ISPICKVAL(Work_Type__c, "Data Maintenance") && Case_Age_In_Business_Hours__c <50, "Target",
IF(ISPICKVAL(Work_Type__c, "User Support") && Case_Age_In_Business_Hours__c <10 , "Stretch", IF(ISPICKVAL(Work_Type__c, "User Support") && Case_Age_In_Business_Hours__c <20, "Target", "Fail"))))))))
CustomField.label: Within KPI
